Summary: Biochemical reaction from paclitaxel to 3'-p-hydroxypaclitaxel. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from paclitaxel to 6alpha-hydroxypaclitaxel. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C8.
Biochemical reaction from 3'-p-hydroxypaclitaxel to dihydroxypaclitaxel. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C8.
Biochemical reaction from 6alpha-hydroxypaclitaxel to dihydroxypaclitaxel. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
